amendatorysection.catchline: Implied consent to submit to chemical test violation; impounded license; return; prohibited act; effect.
amendatorysection.para: (1) At the end of the impoundment period under section 60-6,211.02, the operator's license shall be returned by the court to the licensee.
(2) Any person who unlawfully operates a motor vehicle during the period of impoundment shall be subject to section 60-4,108.
